function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate identification of interventions due to rapid review process.","Impact":"Missed opportunities to identify effective interventions for pandemic mitigation.","Mitigation":"Conduct a more comprehensive review process to ensure all relevant interventions are identified and considered.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Research team, public health officials"},{"Description":"Incomplete integration of lessons from historical pandemics prior to 1900.","Impact":"Failure to learn from historical pandemics and apply relevant knowledge to current pandemic planning.","Mitigation":"Encourage integration of historical pandemic lessons into future research and policy responses.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, policy makers, historians, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, policy makers"},{"Description":"Rapidly evolving knowledge in the field of pandemic planning and urban connections.","Impact":"Risk of outdated or incomplete information impacting future research and policy responses.","Mitigation":"Regularly update research findings and policy responses to incorporate the latest knowledge and developments.","Technologies":"Information management systems, data analytics tools","People":"Research team, policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research team, policy makers"}]}
